questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A professional services company implements Dynamics 365 Finance using the FastTrack Success by Design framework.

You need to describe the various phases of the implementation to company stakeholders.

In which phase is the activity performed? To answer, drag the appropriate phases to the correct activities. Each phase may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

D. Solution Blueprint Review workshop

During the Solution Blueprint Review workshop, the focus is on reviewing and finalizing the solution design based on the customer's requirements and business processes. This is a critical phase where the design of the solution is validated and refined before moving into the implementation phase. It is during this workshop that user experiences are carefully considered to ensure ease of use, aesthetics, and consistency of experience in the Dynamics 365 Finance application.

The Solution Blueprint Review workshop provides an opportunity for the customer and the implementation team to collaborate and make any necessary adjustments to the solution design to meet the user experience expectations and achieve the desired outcomes. It is a key step in ensuring that the implemented solution aligns with the company's high priority of providing a seamless and user-friendly experience for its users.

comments.content: The correct answer is B and not D, as you can see here: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/dynamics365/fasttrack/solution-workshops.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
User experience design happens in the Implementation workshop. Link: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fasttrack/implementation-workshops

questions.question_text:
A company is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance. The company is in the FastTrack program.

User experience is a high priority for this implementation. The company wants to design the solution for ease of use, aesthetics, and consistency of experience.

You need to determine in which session user experiences are designed.

What is the appropriate session?

HOTSPOT
-

You are a solution architect that implements Dynamics 365 finance and operations apps.

An advanced scenario in master planning includes a product bug.

You need to create a modification to avoid the scenario with the product bug, but Microsoft has not created the required extension capabilities.

You need to recommend a solution to log the product bug and request the extension capabilities.

Which tools should you recommend? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Q1 A. Generate a Customisation Analysis Report (CAR)
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/dev-tools/customization-analysis-report
Q2 A. Enter Go-live date

The Customization Analysis Report is a tool that analyzes your customization and extension models, and runs a predefined set of best practice rules. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/dev-tools/customization-analysis-report

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A midsize company is enrolled in the self-guided FastTrack program. The company is preparing a Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management implementation to go live.

You need to complete the prerequisites for the Go-live checklist.

What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
B. Task Recorder
Use task recording for learning process.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
Using task recording for learning process

questions.question_text:
A company uses a third-party enterprise resource management tool. The company plans to implement Dynamics 365 Finance.

You need to recommend a tool that reduces the learning curve for employees.

Which tool should you recommend?
